title: client wont load
body: my client is at current not working and i would like to get this resolved as soon as possible ive tried restarting my computer and it worked yesterday and my computer hasnt updated since can anyone help me? the sooner thet better because i want to get back to playing

replies.body: Can you give me more details regarding *how* it won't load and what you observe?

I'm having a similar problem with the client (among others):
(1) Currently, after clicking "Play", the login screen immediately closes itself as it comes up (the program stops running in task manager as though it were ended).
(2) Hours before this problem began occurring, earlier today client was freezing multiple times during games, and in some cases crashing during loading screen.

Going to attempt to repair the client to see if it helps, will edit this post if it does.
